description:
Terraforming, is a resource app for the accompanying website: terra4ming.com.
App contains: 
Sample Prayers,
Splinter Check List,
Resource information with links to websites.

Refer to the website terra4ming.com for usage and guidelines.

The Keys of Terraforming allow us to change the atmosphere of earth from one that is hostile to the Kingdom of God
to one that is hospitable to theKingdom of God.
They are:
1.) The Light of Jesus that gives us revelation each day of the hidden sins that give evil power over the world.
2.) Defeating evil by Loving and Forgiving the person who sinned with the Blood of Jesus and the spoken word of
their testimony.
3.) Remove evil with the Authority of Jesus, tearing down their strongholds.
